sentences.en: A waterborne epoxy - polyurethane paint is synthesized according to the scientific principles of formulation design.
sentences.cn: 采用科学的配方设计原理,合成了水性环氧聚酯.

sentences.en: And yet , 6,000 children do die, every single day, from waterborne illnesses.
sentences.cn: 然而, 每一天的确有6, 000个孩子死于与水有关的疾病.

sentences.en: Because they measured success only by the number of wells built and the decline of waterborne illnesses, they missed early signs of the arsenicosis crisis.
sentences.cn: 因为他们认为的成功只是水井的数量和减少水传播的疾病，他们忽视掉了早期砷中毒所带来的危机信号。

sentences.en: Bubbles easily occurs in waterborne polyurethane wood varnish, which will influence the decoration effects.
sentences.cn: 水性聚氨酯木器漆极易产生气泡, 影响其装饰性.

sentences.en: Environmental pressures are strengthening the case for waterborne freight.
sentences.cn: 环境的压力使人们更加认可水上运输。

sentences.en: Haven development needs special geography and waterborne environment.
sentences.cn: 港口发展需要非凡的地理和水运环境.

sentences.en: No Indian labourers under any employment program are given preventive information or materials — not even a bar of soap, even though 60 per cent of diseases are waterborne.
sentences.cn: 在任何就业项目中的印度劳动者都没有获得预防信息或材料——即便60%的疾病是通过水传播的，他们甚至没有一块肥皂。

sentences.en: Polyamine - epoxy adduct is used as waterborne epoxy hardener generally.
sentences.cn: 水性环氧固化剂一般采用多元胺 - 环氧加成物.

sentences.en: Specialized in water - borne industrial coatings, waterborne architectural coatings development and production.
sentences.cn: 专业从事 水性 工业涂料 、 水性建筑涂料的开发和生产.

sentences.en: The application of additives in waterborne automotive base coats were introduced.
sentences.cn: 对助剂在汽车用水性底色漆中的应用作了介绍.

sentences.en: The development status of waterborne epoxy paint system was reviewed.
sentences.cn: 概述了水性环氧涂料体系的研发状况.

sentences.en: The preparation method and technics of waterborne polyurethane are optimized.
sentences.cn: 优化了水性聚氨酯体系的制备方法及工艺条件.

sentences.en: The researchers say their approach could also be used to identify the risk of other waterborne diseases, such as those caused by the bacteria Shigella, Salmonella, and Escherichia coli.
sentences.cn: 这组科学家说，他们的方法还可以用于检测其他水传播疾病的风险，例如由志贺氏菌、沙门氏菌和埃希氏大肠杆菌引发的疾病。

sentences.en: The title alkyd resin modified waterborne nitrocellulose emulsion was prepared by alkyd resin phase inversion process.
sentences.cn: 采用醇酸树脂相反转乳化法制备了硝化纤维素乳液.

sentences.en: The waterborne epoxy coatings for inner cabin are formulated.
sentences.cn: 研制了水性环氧内舱涂料.

sentences.en: They are at risk of getting ill and dying from waterborne diseases.
sentences.cn: 他们正处于水上传播疾病的威胁之中.

sentences.en: We use environmental friendly waterborne materials for coating which has no smell.
sentences.cn: 涂布涂料采用水性涂料,无异味,确保绿色环保.
